metadata.name: Jager #1/50
metadata.description: There is no greater blessing than being well-connected, and when Jager showed a fondness for the Erewhonian Fire Sauce that precluded the ascent to high office which was his lizard-born birthright, his family quietly established him in the role of inn-keeper, catering to the lower orders, but not in a position, they believed, to cause further embarrassment.
